# About Me
I'm a post-doc at the [Institut FÃ¼r Quanteninformation](http://www.quantuminfo.physik.rwth-aachen.de/) at the RWTH in Aachen. I study the design and implementation of quantum error-correcting codes in superconducting architectures.
